resources: MyoTester Ready for workout? I\'m Ready!> Start> Stop> Cont> Press Demo-run to check the protocol, OR press START (Volume Up) button to begin a group of tests > Press STOP (Volume Down) button when getting fatigue> Please check the protocol> Current workout count:> Saved workout count: > Demo-run> (Wait to begin)\nProtocol instructions will appear here> Please be steady for 3s> Please put the weight UP in 2s> Please hold the weight for 3s> Please put the weight DOWN in 2s> Please relax and prepare for next workout> The test will stop...> Information> Confirm> First Name> Arm> Group #> Dumbbell (lbs.)> You\'re done for this group!\nPlease relax for a while > You\'re done for all groups!> Please come back for next group at:> workouts were made this time!>
